Summary: Large gold disc in lava fields
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wahiawa
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile stationed at Scofield Army base, Hawaii,1991 a large gold disc was seen by 7 members of a re-con sqaud on patrol. Approx. 20 yard diameter gold disc shaped object was sitting in a lava field from 3 - 6am. Then it slowly started to float away from the lava tube and shot up at a 45 degree angle away from witnesses and was gone.
